mil7.7.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘panthamakkatakassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.1:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, panthamakkatako panthe makkatajalavitanam katva yadi tattha jalake laggati kimi va makkhika va patango va, tam gahetva bhakkhayati;
mil7.7.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena chasu dvaresu satipatthanajalavitanam katva yadi tattha kilesamakkhika bajjhanti, tattheva ghatetabba.
mil7.7.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, panthamakkatakassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
